class.name: Physics2DDirectBodyState
class.brief_description: Direct access object to a physics body in the [Physics2DServer].
class.description: Provides direct access to a physics body in the [Physics2DServer], allowing safe changes to physics properties. This object is passed via the direct state callback of rigid/character bodies, and is intended for changing the direct state of that body. See [method RigidBody2D._integrate_forces].

method.name: add_central_force
method.description: Adds a constant directional force without affecting rotation.

method.name: add_force
method.description: Adds a positioned force to the body. Both the force and the offset from the body origin are in global coordinates.

method.name: add_torque
method.description: Adds a constant rotational force.

method.name: apply_central_impulse
method.description: Applies a directional impulse without affecting rotation.

method.name: apply_impulse
method.description: Applies a positioned impulse to the body. An impulse is time-independent! Applying an impulse every frame would result in a framerate-dependent force. For this reason, it should only be used when simulating one-time impacts (use the "_force" functions otherwise). The offset uses the rotation of the global coordinate system, but is centered at the object's origin.

method.name: apply_torque_impulse
method.description: Applies a rotational impulse to the body.

method.name: get_contact_collider
method.description: Returns the collider's [RID].

method.name: get_contact_collider_id
method.description: Returns the collider's object id.

method.name: get_contact_collider_object
method.description: Returns the collider object. This depends on how it was created (will return a scene node if such was used to create it).

method.name: get_contact_collider_position
method.description: Returns the contact position in the collider.

method.name: get_contact_collider_shape
method.description: Returns the collider's shape index.

method.name: get_contact_collider_shape_metadata
method.description: Returns the collided shape's metadata. This metadata is different from [method Object.get_meta], and is set with [method Physics2DServer.shape_set_data].

method.name: get_contact_collider_velocity_at_position
method.description: Returns the linear velocity vector at the collider's contact point.

method.name: get_contact_count
method.description: Returns the number of contacts this body has with other bodies. [b]Note:[/b] By default, this returns 0 unless bodies are configured to monitor contacts. See [member RigidBody2D.contact_monitor].

method.name: get_contact_local_normal
method.description: Returns the local normal at the contact point.

method.name: get_contact_local_position
method.description: Returns the local position of the contact point.

method.name: get_contact_local_shape
method.description: Returns the local shape index of the collision.

method.name: get_space_state
method.description: Returns the current state of the space, useful for queries.

method.name: get_velocity_at_local_position
method.description: Returns the body's velocity at the given relative position, including both translation and rotation.

method.name: integrate_forces
method.description: Calls the built-in force integration code.
